Nature of Intervention.quote: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope. (Jeremiah 29:11)

Divine Will.quote: But Allah is the best of planners. (Quran 8:30)

Miraculous Events.quote: With man this is impossible, but with God all things are possible. (Matthew 19:26)

Divine Grace.quote: By grace alone. Through faith alone. In Christ alone. (Ephesians 2:8-9)

Divine Protection.quote: No misfortune can happen on earth or in your souls but is recorded in a decree before We bring it into existence. (Quran 57:22)

Divine Guidance.quote: For this God is our God forever and ever; he will be our guide even to the end. (Psalm 48:14)

Divine Timing.quote: To everything there is a season, and a time to every purpose under heaven. (Ecclesiastes 3:1)

Divine Purpose.quote: And we know that for those who love God all things work together for good. (Romans 8:28)

Divine Signs.quote: We will show them Our signs in the horizons and within themselves. (Quran 41:53)

Divine Help.quote: Our help is in the name of the LORD, who made heaven and earth. (Psalm 124:8)

Divine Presence.quote: Be still, and know that I am God. (Psalm 46:10)

Divine Action.quote: The LORD will fight for you; you need only to be still. (Exodus 14:14)

Divine Providence.quote: And my God will supply every need of yours according to his riches in glory. (Philippians 4:19)

Divine Response.quote: Call upon Me and I will answer you. (Quran 40:60)

Divine Healing.quote: I am the LORD who heals you. (Exodus 15:26)

Divine Justice.quote: For the LORD is a God of justice; blessed are all those who wait for him. (Isaiah 30:18)

Divine Mercy.quote: The steadfast love of the LORD never ceases; his mercies never come to an end. (Lamentations 3:22-23)

Divine Synchronicity.quote: For everything there is a season, and a time for every matter under heaven. (Ecclesiastes 3:1)

Divine Order.quote: But all things should be done decently and in order. (1 Corinthians 14:40)

Divine Plan.quote: Many are the plans in the mind of a man, but it is the purpose of the LORD that will stand. (Proverbs 19:21)

Divine Power.quote: Now to him who is able to do far more abundantly than all that we ask or think. (Ephesians 3:20)

Divine Assistance.quote: I lift up my eyes to the hills. From where does my help come? My help comes from the LORD. (Psalm 121:1-2)

Divine Deliverance.quote: The LORD is my rock and my fortress and my deliverer. (Psalm 18:2)

Divine Direction.quote: Trust in the LORD with all your heart, and do not lean on your own understanding. (Proverbs 3:5)

Divine Manifestation.quote: Be strong and courageous. Do not fear or be in dread of them, for it is the LORD your God who goes with you. (Deuteronomy 31:6)

Divine Blessing.quote: The LORD bless you and keep you; the LORD make his face to shine upon you. (Numbers 6:24-26)

Divine Miracles.quote: With God nothing shall be impossible. (Luke 1:37)

Divine Support.quote: Fear not, for I am with you; be not dismayed, for I am your God; I will strengthen you. (Isaiah 41:10)

Divine Transformation.quote: And we all, with unveiled face, beholding the glory of the Lord, are being transformed. (2 Corinthians 3:18)

Divine Resolution.quote: Commit your way to the LORD; trust in him, and he will act. (Psalm 37:5)
